snippet.title: Toy Odyssey: The Lost and Found Preview and Gameplay (Xbox One/Steam)
snippet.description:
In this video, we show a preview of the game ‘Toy Odyssey The Lost and Found’ for Xbox One. Video was Recorded and Voiced by The Hidden Levels one and only Manic Ado. Review copy was provided to us by the developer and/or publisher.

Toy Odyssey is fundamentally an action-adventure platformer. The player spends the night exploring a randomly-generated house, defeating bosses in each of the unique rooms, and then going up against the final boss.

Title: Toy Odyssey (Toy Quest)
Developer: Hiker Games
Publisher: Digital Smash 
Platform: Xbox One, Steam
Release Date: 21st September 2016
Official Site:  http://hikergames.com/
Price:  $14.99
Store link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/392410/ 


The Hidden Levels is fully committed to bringing you the greatest and best entertainment through means of Twitch, YouTube and all other forms of active media.  We live stream to twitch and upload videos to YouTube daily. The Hidden Levels consists of gamers from all around the world. For more info please visit:

Website: http://www.thehiddenlevels.com   
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thehiddenlevels  
Beam: https://beam.pro/TheHiddenLevels  
Discord: https://discord.gg/pUv9q9y  
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/thehiddenlevels  
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thehiddenlevels  
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+TheHiddenLevels/videos  
Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/thehiddenlevels  
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thehiddenlevels  

Thank you and have a great day.
